metadata.name: Potential ShellDispatch.DLL Functionality Abuse
metadata.comment: Detects potential "ShellDispatch.dll" functionality abuse to execute arbitrary binaries via "ShellExecute"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll_shellexecutew')))

output.summary: Detects potential "ShellDispatch.dll" functionality abuse to execute arbitrary binaries via "ShellExecute"
